headline: Christmas safari works but requires early booking
summary: December-January is peak season for safari with good weather and wildlife. However, it is also the most expensive and busiest time. Booking 9-12 months ahead is essential for best camps. The experience is excellent if booked early; last-minute travelers will find limited options at premium prices.

assumptions.text: Christmas/New Year is peak demand period with highest prices.
Popular camps book 9-12 months ahead for Christmas period.
Weather and wildlife conditions are generally good in December-January.

change_conditions: If booking less than 6 months ahead, expect limited options.
If budget is constrained, consider shoulder periods instead.
If specific camps are desired, book 12 months ahead minimum.
If flexibility exists, late November or mid-January offer similar conditions with less demand.
